name: NNReal.sq_sqrt
initialProofState:
x : NNReal
‚ä¢ Eq (HPow.hPow (NNReal.sqrt x) 2) x
decl: @[simp] lemma sq_sqrt (x : ‚Ñù‚â•0) : sqrt x ^ 2 = x := sqrt.symm_apply_apply _

name: NNReal.sqrt_sq
initialProofState:
x : NNReal
‚ä¢ Eq (NNReal.sqrt (HPow.hPow x 2)) x
decl: @[simp] lemma sqrt_sq (x : ‚Ñù‚â•0) : sqrt (x ^ 2) = x := sqrt.apply_symm_apply _

name: NNReal.mul_self_sqrt
initialProofState:

‚ä¢ Eq (HMul.hMul (NNReal.sqrt x) (NNReal.sqrt x)) x
decl: @[simp] lemma mul_self_sqrt (x : ‚Ñù‚â•0) : sqrt x * sqrt x = x := by rw [‚Üê sq, sq_sqrt]

name: NNReal.sqrt_mul_self
initialProofState:
x : NNReal
‚ä¢ Eq (NNReal.sqrt (HMul.hMul x x)) x
decl: @[simp] lemma sqrt_mul_self (x : ‚Ñù‚â•0) : sqrt (x * x) = x := by rw [‚Üê sq, sqrt_sq]

name: NNReal.sqrt_le_sqrt
initialProofState:
x y : NNReal
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le (NNReal.sqrt x) (NNReal.sqrt y)) (LE.le x y)
decl: lemma sqrt_le_sqrt : sqrt x ‚â§ sqrt y ‚Üî x ‚â§ y := sqrt.le_iff_le

name: NNReal.sqrt_lt_sqrt
initialProofState:
x y : NNReal
‚ä¢ Iff (LT.lt (NNReal.sqrt x) (NNReal.sqrt y)) (LT.lt x y)
decl: lemma sqrt_lt_sqrt : sqrt x < sqrt y ‚Üî x < y := sqrt.lt_iff_lt

name: NNReal.sqrt_eq_iff_eq_sq
initialProofState:
x y : NNReal
‚ä¢ Iff (Eq (NNReal.sqrt x) y) (Eq x (HPow.hPow y 2))
decl: lemma sqrt_eq_iff_eq_sq : sqrt x = y ‚Üî x = y ^ 2 := sqrt.toEquiv.apply_eq_iff_eq_symm_apply

name: NNReal.sqrt_le_iff_le_sq
initialProofState:
x y : NNReal
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le (NNReal.sqrt x) y) (LE.le x (HPow.hPow y 2))
decl: lemma sqrt_le_iff_le_sq : sqrt x ‚â§ y ‚Üî x ‚â§ y ^ 2 := sqrt.to_galoisConnection _ _

name: NNReal.le_sqrt_iff_sq_le
initialProofState:
x y : NNReal
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le x (NNReal.sqrt y)) (LE.le (HPow.hPow x 2) y)
decl: lemma le_sqrt_iff_sq_le : x ‚â§ sqrt y ‚Üî x ^ 2 ‚â§ y := (sqrt.symm.to_galoisConnection _ _).symm

name: NNReal.sqrt_eq_zero
initialProofState:
x : NNReal
‚ä¢ Iff (Eq (NNReal.sqrt x) 0) (Eq x 0)
decl: @[simp] lemma sqrt_eq_zero : sqrt x = 0 ‚Üî x = 0 := by simp [sqrt_eq_iff_eq_sq]

name: NNReal.sqrt_eq_one
initialProofState:
x : NNReal
‚ä¢ Iff (Eq (NNReal.sqrt x) 1) (Eq x 1)
decl: @[simp] lemma sqrt_eq_one : sqrt x = 1 ‚Üî x = 1 := by simp [sqrt_eq_iff_eq_sq]

name: NNReal.sqrt_zero
initialProofState: ‚ä¢ Eq (NNReal.sqrt 0) 0
decl: @[simp] lemma sqrt_zero : sqrt 0 = 0 := by simp

name: NNReal.sqrt_one
initialProofState: ‚ä¢ Eq (NNReal.sqrt 1) 1
decl: @[simp] lemma sqrt_one : sqrt 1 = 1 := by simp

name: NNReal.sqrt_le_one
initialProofState:
x : NNReal
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le (NNReal.sqrt x) 1) (LE.le x 1)
decl: @[simp] lemma sqrt_le_one : sqrt x ‚â§ 1 ‚Üî x ‚â§ 1 := by rw [‚Üê sqrt_one, sqrt_le_sqrt, sqrt_one]

name: NNReal.one_le_sqrt
initialProofState:
x : NNReal
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le 1 (NNReal.sqrt x)) (LE.le 1 x)
decl: @[simp] lemma one_le_sqrt : 1 ‚â§ sqrt x ‚Üî 1 ‚â§ x := by rw [‚Üê sqrt_one, sqrt_le_sqrt, sqrt_one]

name: NNReal.sqrt_mul
initialProofState:
x y : NNReal
‚ä¢ Eq (NNReal.sqrt (HMul.hMul x y)) (HMul.hMul (NNReal.sqrt x) (NNReal.sqrt y))
decl:
theorem sqrt_mul (x y : ‚Ñù‚â•0) : sqrt (x * y) = sqrt x * sqrt y := by
  rw [sqrt_eq_iff_eq_sq, mul_pow, sq_sqrt, sq_sqrt]

name: NNReal.sqrt_inv
initialProofState:
x : NNReal
‚ä¢ Eq (NNReal.sqrt (Inv.inv x)) (Inv.inv (NNReal.sqrt x))
decl:
theorem sqrt_inv (x : ‚Ñù‚â•0) : sqrt x‚Åª¬π = (sqrt x)‚Åª¬π :=
  map_inv‚ÇÄ sqrtHom x

name: NNReal.sqrt_div
initialProofState:

‚ä¢ Eq (NNReal.sqrt (HDiv.hDiv x y)) (HDiv.hDiv (NNReal.sqrt x) (NNReal.sqrt y))
decl:
theorem sqrt_div (x y : ‚Ñù‚â•0) : sqrt (x / y) = sqrt x / sqrt y :=
  map_div‚ÇÄ sqrtHom x y

name: NNReal.continuous_sqrt
initialProofState: ‚ä¢ Continuous ‚áëNNReal.sqrt
decl:
@[continuity, fun_prop]
theorem continuous_sqrt : Continuous sqrt := sqrt.continuous

name: NNReal.sqrt_pos
initialProofState:
x : NNReal
‚ä¢ Iff (LT.lt 0 (NNReal.sqrt x)) (LT.lt 0 x)
decl: @[simp] theorem sqrt_pos : 0 < sqrt x ‚Üî 0 < x := by simp [pos_iff_ne_zero]

name: NNReal.sqrt_pos_of_pos
initialProofState:
x : NNReal
a‚úù : LT.lt 0 x
‚ä¢ LT.lt 0 (NNReal.sqrt x)
decl: alias ‚ü®_, sqrt_pos_of_pos‚ü© := sqrt_pos

name: Real.coe_sqrt
initialProofState:
x : NNReal
‚ä¢ Eq (‚Üë(NNReal.sqrt x)) (‚Üëx).sqrt
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem coe_sqrt {x : ‚Ñù‚â•0} : (NNReal.sqrt x : ‚Ñù) = ‚àö(x : ‚Ñù) := by
  rw [Real.sqrt, Real.toNNReal_coe]

name: Real.continuous_sqrt
initialProofState: ‚ä¢ Continuous fun x => x.sqrt
decl:
@[continuity]
theorem continuous_sqrt : Continuous (‚àö¬∑ : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù) :=
  NNReal.continuous_coe.comp <| NNReal.continuous_sqrt.comp continuous_real_toNNReal

name: Real.sqrt_eq_zero_of_nonpos
initialProofState:
x : Real
h : LE.le x 0
‚ä¢ Eq x.sqrt 0
decl: theorem sqrt_eq_zero_of_nonpos (h : x ‚â§ 0) : sqrt x = 0 := by simp [sqrt, Real.toNNReal_eq_zero.2 h]

name: Real.sqrt_nonneg
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ LE.le 0 x.sqrt
decl: @[simp] theorem sqrt_nonneg (x : ‚Ñù) : 0 ‚â§ ‚àöx := NNReal.coe_nonneg _

name: Real.mul_self_sqrt
initialProofState:
x : Real
h : LE.le 0 x
‚ä¢ Eq (HMul.hMul x.sqrt x.sqrt) x
decl:
@[simp]
theorem mul_self_sqrt (h : 0 ‚â§ x) : ‚àöx * ‚àöx = x := by
  rw [Real.sqrt, ‚Üê NNReal.coe_mul, NNReal.mul_self_sqrt, Real.coe_toNNReal _ h]

name: Real.sqrt_mul_self
initialProofState:
x : Real
h : LE.le 0 x
‚ä¢ Eq (HMul.hMul x x).sqrt x
decl:
@[simp]
theorem sqrt_mul_self (h : 0 ‚â§ x) : ‚àö(x * x) = x :=
  (mul_self_inj_of_nonneg (sqrt_nonneg _) h).1 (mul_self_sqrt (mul_self_nonneg _))

name: Real.sqrt_eq_cases
initialProofState:
x y : Real
‚ä¢ Iff (Eq x.sqrt y) (Or (And (Eq (HMul.hMul y y) x) (LE.le 0 y)) (And (LT.lt x 0) (Eq y 0)))
decl:
theorem sqrt_eq_cases : ‚àöx = y ‚Üî y * y = x ‚àß 0 ‚â§ y ‚à® x < 0 ‚àß y = 0 := by
  constructor
  ¬∑ rintro rfl
    rcases le_or_lt 0 x with hle | hlt
    ¬∑ exact Or.inl ‚ü®mul_self_sqrt hle, sqrt_nonneg x‚ü©
    ¬∑ exact Or.inr ‚ü®hlt, sqrt_eq_zero_of_nonpos hlt.le‚ü©
  ¬∑ rintro (‚ü®rfl, hy‚ü© | ‚ü®hx, rfl‚ü©)
    exacts [sqrt_mul_self hy, sqrt_eq_zero_of_nonpos hx.le]

name: Real.sqrt_eq_iff_mul_self_eq
initialProofState:
x y : Real
hx : LE.le 0 x
hy : LE.le 0 y
‚ä¢ Iff (Eq x.sqrt y) (Eq x (HMul.hMul y y))
decl:
theorem sqrt_eq_iff_mul_self_eq (hx : 0 ‚â§ x) (hy : 0 ‚â§ y) : ‚àöx = y ‚Üî x = y * y :=
  ‚ü®fun h => by rw [‚Üê h, mul_self_sqrt hx], fun h => by rw [h, sqrt_mul_self hy]‚ü©

name: Real.sqrt_eq_iff_eq_mul_self
initialProofState:
x y : Real
hx : LE.le 0 x
hy : LE.le 0 y
‚ä¢ Iff (Eq x.sqrt y) (Eq (HMul.hMul y y) x)
decl:
@[deprecated sqrt_eq_iff_mul_self_eq (since := "2024-08-25")]
theorem sqrt_eq_iff_eq_mul_self (hx : 0 ‚â§ x) (hy : 0 ‚â§ y) : ‚àöx = y ‚Üî y * y = x := by
  rw [sqrt_eq_iff_mul_self_eq hx hy, eq_comm]

name: Real.sqrt_eq_iff_mul_self_eq_of_pos
initialProofState:
x y : Real
h : LT.lt 0 y
‚ä¢ Iff (Eq x.sqrt y) (Eq (HMul.hMul y y) x)
decl:
theorem sqrt_eq_iff_mul_self_eq_of_pos (h : 0 < y) : ‚àöx = y ‚Üî y * y = x := by
  simp [sqrt_eq_cases, h.ne', h.le]

name: Real.sqrt_eq_one
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Iff (Eq x.sqrt 1) (Eq x 1)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem sqrt_eq_one : ‚àöx = 1 ‚Üî x = 1 :=
  calc
    ‚àöx = 1 ‚Üî 1 * 1 = x := sqrt_eq_iff_mul_self_eq_of_pos zero_lt_one
    _ ‚Üî x = 1 := by rw [eq_comm, mul_one]

name: Real.sq_sqrt

‚ä¢ Eq (HPow.hPow x.sqrt 2) x

initialProofState:
x y : Real

‚ä¢ Iff (Eq x.sqrt y) (Eq x (HPow.hPow y 2))

name: Real.sqrt_eq_iff_sq_eq
initialProofState:
x y : Real
hx : LE.le 0 x
hy : LE.le 0 y
‚ä¢ Iff (Eq x.sqrt y) (Eq (HPow.hPow y 2) x)

theorem sqrt_eq_iff_sq_eq (hx : 0 ‚â§ x) (hy : 0 ‚â§ y) : ‚àöx = y ‚Üî y ^ 2 = x := by

name: Real.sqrt_mul_self_eq_abs
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (HMul.hMul x x).sqrt (abs x)
decl:
theorem sqrt_mul_self_eq_abs (x : ‚Ñù) : ‚àö(x * x) = |x| := by
  rw [‚Üê abs_mul_abs_self x, sqrt_mul_self (abs_nonneg _)]

name: Real.sqrt_sq_eq_abs
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (HPow.hPow x 2).sqrt (abs x)
decl: theorem sqrt_sq_eq_abs (x : ‚Ñù) : ‚àö(x ^ 2) = |x| := by rw [sq, sqrt_mul_self_eq_abs]

name: Real.sqrt_zero
initialProofState: ‚ä¢ Eq (Real.sqrt 0) 0

name: Real.sqrt_one

name: Real.sqrt_le_sqrt_iff
initialProofState:
x y : Real
hy : LE.le 0 y
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le x.sqrt y.sqrt) (LE.le x y)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem sqrt_le_sqrt_iff (hy : 0 ‚â§ y) : ‚àöx ‚â§ ‚àöy ‚Üî x ‚â§ y := by
  rw [Real.sqrt, Real.sqrt, NNReal.coe_le_coe, NNReal.sqrt_le_sqrt, toNNReal_le_toNNReal_iff hy]

name: Real.sqrt_lt_sqrt_iff
initialProofState:
x y : Real
hx : LE.le 0 x
‚ä¢ Iff (LT.lt x.sqrt y.sqrt) (LT.lt x y)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem sqrt_lt_sqrt_iff (hx : 0 ‚â§ x) : ‚àöx < ‚àöy ‚Üî x < y :=
  lt_iff_lt_of_le_iff_le (sqrt_le_sqrt_iff hx)

name: Real.sqrt_lt_sqrt_iff_of_pos
initialProofState:
x y : Real
hy : LT.lt 0 y
‚ä¢ Iff (LT.lt x.sqrt y.sqrt) (LT.lt x y)
decl:
theorem sqrt_lt_sqrt_iff_of_pos (hy : 0 < y) : ‚àöx < ‚àöy ‚Üî x < y := by

name: Real.sqrt_le_sqrt
initialProofState:
x y : Real
h : LE.le x y
‚ä¢ LE.le x.sqrt y.sqrt
decl:
@[gcongr, bound]
theorem sqrt_le_sqrt (h : x ‚â§ y) : ‚àöx ‚â§ ‚àöy := by
  rw [Real.sqrt, Real.sqrt, NNReal.coe_le_coe, NNReal.sqrt_le_sqrt]
  exact toNNReal_le_toNNReal h

name: Real.sqrt_lt_sqrt
initialProofState:
x y : Real
hx : LE.le 0 x
h : LT.lt x y
‚ä¢ LT.lt x.sqrt y.sqrt
decl:
@[gcongr, bound]
theorem sqrt_lt_sqrt (hx : 0 ‚â§ x) (h : x < y) : ‚àöx < ‚àöy :=
  (sqrt_lt_sqrt_iff hx).2 h

name: Real.sqrt_le_left
initialProofState:
x y : Real
hy : LE.le 0 y
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le x.sqrt y) (LE.le x (HPow.hPow y 2))
decl:
theorem sqrt_le_left (hy : 0 ‚â§ y) : ‚àöx ‚â§ y ‚Üî x ‚â§ y ^ 2 := by
  rw [sqrt, ‚Üê Real.le_toNNReal_iff_coe_le hy, NNReal.sqrt_le_iff_le_sq, sq, ‚Üê Real.toNNReal_mul hy,
    Real.toNNReal_le_toNNReal_iff (mul_self_nonneg y), sq]

name: Real.sqrt_le_iff
initialProofState:
x y : Real
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le x.sqrt y) (And (LE.le 0 y) (LE.le x (HPow.hPow y 2)))
decl:
theorem sqrt_le_iff : ‚àöx ‚â§ y ‚Üî 0 ‚â§ y ‚àß x ‚â§ y ^ 2 := by
  rw [‚Üê and_iff_right_of_imp fun h => (sqrt_nonneg x).trans h, and_congr_right_iff]
  exact sqrt_le_left

name: Real.sqrt_lt
initialProofState:
x y : Real
hx : LE.le 0 x
hy : LE.le 0 y
‚ä¢ Iff (LT.lt x.sqrt y) (LT.lt x (HPow.hPow y 2))
decl:
theorem sqrt_lt (hx : 0 ‚â§ x) (hy : 0 ‚â§ y) : ‚àöx < y ‚Üî x < y ^ 2 := by
  rw [‚Üê sqrt_lt_sqrt_iff hx, sqrt_sq hy]

name: Real.sqrt_lt'
initialProofState:
x y : Real
hy : LT.lt 0 y
‚ä¢ Iff (LT.lt x.sqrt y) (LT.lt x (HPow.hPow y 2))
decl:
theorem sqrt_lt' (hy : 0 < y) : ‚àöx < y ‚Üî x < y ^ 2 := by
  rw [‚Üê sqrt_lt_sqrt_iff_of_pos (pow_pos hy _), sqrt_sq hy.le]

name: Real.le_sqrt
initialProofState:
x y : Real
hx : LE.le 0 x
hy : LE.le 0 y
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le x y.sqrt) (LE.le (HPow.hPow x 2) y)
decl:
/-- Note: if you want to conclude `x ‚â§ ‚àöy`, then use `Real.le_sqrt_of_sq_le`.
If you have `x > 0`, consider using `Real.le_sqrt'` -/
theorem le_sqrt (hx : 0 ‚â§ x) (hy : 0 ‚â§ y) : x ‚â§ ‚àöy ‚Üî x ^ 2 ‚â§ y :=
  le_iff_le_iff_lt_iff_lt.2 <| sqrt_lt hy hx

name: Real.le_sqrt'
initialProofState:
x y : Real
hx : LT.lt 0 x
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le x y.sqrt) (LE.le (HPow.hPow x 2) y)
decl:
theorem le_sqrt' (hx : 0 < x) : x ‚â§ ‚àöy ‚Üî x ^ 2 ‚â§ y :=
  le_iff_le_iff_lt_iff_lt.2 <| sqrt_lt' hx

name: Real.abs_le_sqrt
initialProofState:
x y : Real
h : LE.le (HPow.hPow x 2) y
‚ä¢ LE.le (abs x) y.sqrt
decl:
theorem abs_le_sqrt (h : x ^ 2 ‚â§ y) : |x| ‚â§ ‚àöy := by
  rw [‚Üê sqrt_sq_eq_abs]; exact sqrt_le_sqrt h

name: Real.sq_le
initialProofState:
x y : Real
h : LE.le 0 y
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le (HPow.hPow x 2) y) (And (LE.le (Neg.neg y.sqrt) x) (LE.le x y.sqrt))
decl:
theorem sq_le (h : 0 ‚â§ y) : x ^ 2 ‚â§ y ‚Üî -‚àöy ‚â§ x ‚àß x ‚â§ ‚àöy := by
  constructor
  ¬∑ simpa only [abs_le] using abs_le_sqrt
  ¬∑ rw [‚Üê abs_le, ‚Üê sq_abs]
    exact (le_sqrt (abs_nonneg x) h).mp

name: Real.neg_sqrt_le_of_sq_le
initialProofState:
x y : Real
h : LE.le (HPow.hPow x 2) y
‚ä¢ LE.le (Neg.neg y.sqrt) x
decl:
theorem neg_sqrt_le_of_sq_le (h : x ^ 2 ‚â§ y) : -‚àöy ‚â§ x :=
  ((sq_le ((sq_nonneg x).trans h)).mp h).1

name: Real.le_sqrt_of_sq_le
initialProofState:
x y : Real
h : LE.le (HPow.hPow x 2) y
‚ä¢ LE.le x y.sqrt
decl:
theorem le_sqrt_of_sq_le (h : x ^ 2 ‚â§ y) : x ‚â§ ‚àöy :=
  ((sq_le ((sq_nonneg x).trans h)).mp h).2

name: Real.sqrt_inj
initialProofState:
x y : Real
hx : LE.le 0 x
hy : LE.le 0 y
‚ä¢ Iff (Eq x.sqrt y.sqrt) (Eq x y)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem sqrt_inj (hx : 0 ‚â§ x) (hy : 0 ‚â§ y) : ‚àöx = ‚àöy ‚Üî x = y := by
  simp [le_antisymm_iff, hx, hy]

name: Real.sqrt_eq_zero
initialProofState:
x : Real
h : LE.le 0 x
‚ä¢ Iff (Eq x.sqrt 0) (Eq x 0)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem sqrt_eq_zero (h : 0 ‚â§ x) : ‚àöx = 0 ‚Üî x = 0 := by simpa using sqrt_inj h le_rfl

name: Real.sqrt_eq_zero'
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Iff (Eq x.sqrt 0) (LE.le x 0)
decl:
theorem sqrt_eq_zero' : ‚àöx = 0 ‚Üî x ‚â§ 0 := by
  rw [sqrt, NNReal.coe_eq_zero, NNReal.sqrt_eq_zero, Real.toNNReal_eq_zero]

name: Real.sqrt_ne_zero
initialProofState:
x : Real
h : LE.le 0 x
‚ä¢ Iff (Ne x.sqrt 0) (Ne x 0)
decl: theorem sqrt_ne_zero (h : 0 ‚â§ x) : ‚àöx ‚â† 0 ‚Üî x ‚â† 0 := by rw [not_iff_not, sqrt_eq_zero h]

name: Real.sqrt_ne_zero'
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Iff (Ne x.sqrt 0) (LT.lt 0 x)
decl: theorem sqrt_ne_zero' : ‚àöx ‚â† 0 ‚Üî 0 < x := by rw [‚Üê not_le, not_iff_not, sqrt_eq_zero']

name: Real.sqrt_pos
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Iff (LT.lt 0 x.sqrt) (LT.lt 0 x)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem sqrt_pos : 0 < ‚àöx ‚Üî 0 < x :=
  lt_iff_lt_of_le_iff_le (Iff.trans (by simp [le_antisymm_iff, sqrt_nonneg]) sqrt_eq_zero')

name: Real.sqrt_pos_of_pos
initialProofState:
x : Real
a‚úù : LT.lt 0 x
‚ä¢ LT.lt 0 x.sqrt
decl: alias ‚ü®_, sqrt_pos_of_pos‚ü© := sqrt_pos

name: Real.sqrt_le_sqrt_iff'
initialProofState:
x y : Real
hx : LT.lt 0 x
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le x.sqrt y.sqrt) (LE.le x y)
decl:
lemma sqrt_le_sqrt_iff' (hx : 0 < x) : ‚àöx ‚â§ ‚àöy ‚Üî x ‚â§ y := by
  obtain hy | hy := le_total y 0
  ¬∑ exact iff_of_false ((sqrt_eq_zero_of_nonpos hy).trans_lt <| sqrt_pos.2 hx).not_le
      (hy.trans_lt hx).not_le
  ¬∑ exact sqrt_le_sqrt_iff hy

name: Real.one_le_sqrt
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le 1 x.sqrt) (LE.le 1 x)
decl:
@[simp] lemma one_le_sqrt : 1 ‚â§ ‚àöx ‚Üî 1 ‚â§ x := by
  rw [‚Üê sqrt_one, sqrt_le_sqrt_iff' zero_lt_one, sqrt_one]

name: Real.sqrt_le_one
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le x.sqrt 1) (LE.le x 1)
decl:
@[simp] lemma sqrt_le_one : ‚àöx ‚â§ 1 ‚Üî x ‚â§ 1 := by
  rw [‚Üê sqrt_one, sqrt_le_sqrt_iff zero_le_one, sqrt_one]

name: Real.sqrt_mul
initialProofState:
x : Real
hx : LE.le 0 x
y : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (HMul.hMul x y).sqrt (HMul.hMul x.sqrt y.sqrt)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem sqrt_mul {x : ‚Ñù} (hx : 0 ‚â§ x) (y : ‚Ñù) : ‚àö(x * y) = ‚àöx * ‚àöy := by
  simp_rw [Real.sqrt, ‚Üê NNReal.coe_mul, NNReal.coe_inj, Real.toNNReal_mul hx, NNReal.sqrt_mul]

name: Real.sqrt_mul'
initialProofState:
x y : Real
hy : LE.le 0 y
‚ä¢ Eq (HMul.hMul x y).sqrt (HMul.hMul x.sqrt y.sqrt)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem sqrt_mul' (x) {y : ‚Ñù} (hy : 0 ‚â§ y) : ‚àö(x * y) = ‚àöx * ‚àöy := by
  rw [mul_comm, sqrt_mul hy, mul_comm]

name: Real.sqrt_inv
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (Inv.inv x).sqrt (Inv.inv x.sqrt)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem sqrt_inv (x : ‚Ñù) : ‚àöx‚Åª¬π = (‚àöx)‚Åª¬π := by
  rw [Real.sqrt, Real.toNNReal_inv, NNReal.sqrt_inv, NNReal.coe_inv, Real.sqrt]

name: Real.sqrt_div
initialProofState:
x : Real
hx : LE.le 0 x
y : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (HDiv.hDiv x y).sqrt (HDiv.hDiv x.sqrt y.sqrt)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem sqrt_div {x : ‚Ñù} (hx : 0 ‚â§ x) (y : ‚Ñù) : ‚àö(x / y) = ‚àöx / ‚àöy := by
  rw [division_def, sqrt_mul hx, sqrt_inv, division_def]

name: Real.sqrt_div'
initialProofState:
x y : Real
hy : LE.le 0 y
‚ä¢ Eq (HDiv.hDiv x y).sqrt (HDiv.hDiv x.sqrt y.sqrt)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem sqrt_div' (x) {y : ‚Ñù} (hy : 0 ‚â§ y) : ‚àö(x / y) = ‚àöx / ‚àöy := by
  rw [division_def, sqrt_mul' x (inv_nonneg.2 hy), sqrt_inv, division_def]

name: Real.div_sqrt
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (HDiv.hDiv x x.sqrt) x.sqrt
decl:
@[simp]
theorem div_sqrt : x / ‚àöx = ‚àöx := by
  rcases le_or_lt x 0 with h | h
  ¬∑ rw [sqrt_eq_zero'.mpr h, div_zero]
  ¬∑ rw [div_eq_iff (sqrt_ne_zero'.mpr h), mul_self_sqrt h.le]

name: Real.sqrt_div_self'
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (HDiv.hDiv x.sqrt x) (HDiv.hDiv 1 x.sqrt)
decl: theorem sqrt_div_self' : ‚àöx / x = 1 / ‚àöx := by rw [‚Üê div_sqrt, one_div_div, div_sqrt]

name: Real.sqrt_div_self
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (HDiv.hDiv x.sqrt x) (Inv.inv x.sqrt)
decl: theorem sqrt_div_self : ‚àöx / x = (‚àöx)‚Åª¬π := by rw [sqrt_div_self', one_div]

name: Real.lt_sqrt
initialProofState:
x y : Real
hx : LE.le 0 x
‚ä¢ Iff (LT.lt x y.sqrt) (LT.lt (HPow.hPow x 2) y)
decl:
theorem lt_sqrt (hx : 0 ‚â§ x) : x < ‚àöy ‚Üî x ^ 2 < y := by
  rw [‚Üê sqrt_lt_sqrt_iff (sq_nonneg _), sqrt_sq hx]

name: Real.sq_lt
initialProofState:
x y : Real
‚ä¢ Iff (LT.lt (HPow.hPow x 2) y) (And (LT.lt (Neg.neg y.sqrt) x) (LT.lt x y.sqrt))
decl:
theorem sq_lt : x ^ 2 < y ‚Üî -‚àöy < x ‚àß x < ‚àöy := by
  rw [‚Üê abs_lt, ‚Üê sq_abs, lt_sqrt (abs_nonneg _)]

name: Real.neg_sqrt_lt_of_sq_lt
initialProofState:
x y : Real
h : LT.lt (HPow.hPow x 2) y
‚ä¢ LT.lt (Neg.neg y.sqrt) x
decl:
theorem neg_sqrt_lt_of_sq_lt (h : x ^ 2 < y) : -‚àöy < x :=
  (sq_lt.mp h).1

name: Real.lt_sqrt_of_sq_lt
initialProofState:
x y : Real
h : LT.lt (HPow.hPow x 2) y
‚ä¢ LT.lt x y.sqrt
decl:
theorem lt_sqrt_of_sq_lt (h : x ^ 2 < y) : x < ‚àöy :=
  (sq_lt.mp h).2

name: Real.lt_sq_of_sqrt_lt
initialProofState:
x y : Real
h : LT.lt x.sqrt y
‚ä¢ LT.lt x (HPow.hPow y 2)
decl:
theorem lt_sq_of_sqrt_lt (h : ‚àöx < y) : x < y ^ 2 := by
  have hy := x.sqrt_nonneg.trans_lt h
  rwa [‚Üê sqrt_lt_sqrt_iff_of_pos (sq_pos_of_pos hy), sqrt_sq hy.le]

name: Real.nat_sqrt_le_real_sqrt
initialProofState:
a : Nat
‚ä¢ LE.le (‚Üëa.sqrt) (‚Üëa).sqrt
decl:
/-- The natural square root is at most the real square root -/
theorem nat_sqrt_le_real_sqrt {a : ‚Ñï} : ‚Üë(Nat.sqrt a) ‚â§ ‚àö(a : ‚Ñù) := by
  rw [Real.le_sqrt (Nat.cast_nonneg _) (Nat.cast_nonneg _)]
  norm_cast
  exact Nat.sqrt_le' a

name: Real.real_sqrt_lt_nat_sqrt_succ
initialProofState:
a : Nat
‚ä¢ LT.lt (‚Üëa).sqrt (HAdd.hAdd (‚Üëa.sqrt) 1)
decl:
/-- The real square root is less than the natural square root plus one -/
theorem real_sqrt_lt_nat_sqrt_succ {a : ‚Ñï} : ‚àö(a : ‚Ñù) < Nat.sqrt a + 1 := by
  rw [sqrt_lt (by simp)] <;> norm_cast
  ¬∑ exact Nat.lt_succ_sqrt' a
  ¬∑ exact Nat.le_add_left 0 (Nat.sqrt a + 1)

name: Real.real_sqrt_le_nat_sqrt_succ
initialProofState:
a : Nat
‚ä¢ LE.le (‚Üëa).sqrt (HAdd.hAdd (‚Üëa.sqrt) 1)
decl:
/-- The real square root is at most the natural square root plus one -/
theorem real_sqrt_le_nat_sqrt_succ {a : ‚Ñï} : ‚àö(a : ‚Ñù) ‚â§ Nat.sqrt a + 1 :=
  real_sqrt_lt_nat_sqrt_succ.le

name: Real.floor_real_sqrt_eq_nat_sqrt
initialProofState:
a : Nat
‚ä¢ Eq (Int.floor (‚Üëa).sqrt) ‚Üëa.sqrt
decl:
/-- The floor of the real square root is the same as the natural square root. -/
@[simp]
theorem floor_real_sqrt_eq_nat_sqrt {a : ‚Ñï} : ‚åä‚àö(a : ‚Ñù)‚åã = Nat.sqrt a := by
  rw [Int.floor_eq_iff]
  exact ‚ü®nat_sqrt_le_real_sqrt, real_sqrt_lt_nat_sqrt_succ‚ü©

name: Real.nat_floor_real_sqrt_eq_nat_sqrt
initialProofState:
a : Nat
‚ä¢ Eq (Nat.floor (‚Üëa).sqrt) a.sqrt
decl:
/-- The natural floor of the real square root is the same as the natural square root. -/
@[simp]
theorem nat_floor_real_sqrt_eq_nat_sqrt {a : ‚Ñï} : ‚åä‚àö(a : ‚Ñù)‚åã‚Çä = Nat.sqrt a := by
  rw [Nat.floor_eq_iff (sqrt_nonneg a)]
  exact ‚ü®nat_sqrt_le_real_sqrt, real_sqrt_lt_nat_sqrt_succ‚ü©

name: Real.sqrt_one_add_le
initialProofState:
x : Real
h : LE.le (-1) x
‚ä¢ LE.le (HAdd.hAdd 1 x).sqrt (HAdd.hAdd 1 (HDiv.hDiv x 2))
decl:
/-- Bernoulli's inequality for exponent `1 / 2`, stated using `sqrt`. -/
theorem sqrt_one_add_le (h : -1 ‚â§ x) : ‚àö(1 + x) ‚â§ 1 + x / 2 := by
  refine sqrt_le_iff.mpr ‚ü®by linarith, ?_‚ü©
  calc 1 + x
    _ ‚â§ 1 + x + (x / 2) ^ 2 := le_add_of_nonneg_right <| sq_nonneg _
    _ = _ := by ring

name: Filter.Tendsto.sqrt
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
f : Œ± ‚Üí Real
l : Filter Œ±
x : Real
h : Filter.Tendsto f l (nhds x)
‚ä¢ Filter.Tendsto (fun x => (f x).sqrt) l (nhds x.sqrt)
decl:
theorem Filter.Tendsto.sqrt {f : Œ± ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {l : Filter Œ±} {x : ‚Ñù} (h : Tendsto f l (ùìù x)) :
    Tendsto (fun x => ‚àö(f x)) l (ùìù (‚àöx)) :=
  (continuous_sqrt.tendsto _).comp h

initialProofState:

inst‚úù : TopologicalSpace Œ±

s : Set Œ±

h : ContinuousWithinAt f s x
‚ä¢ ContinuousWithinAt (fun x => (f x).sqrt) s x

nonrec theorem ContinuousWithinAt.sqrt (h : ContinuousWithinAt f s x) :

nonrec theorem ContinuousAt.sqrt (h : ContinuousAt f x) : ContinuousAt (fun x => ‚àö(f x)) x :=

name: Continuous.sqrt
initialProofState:

‚ä¢ Continuous fun x => (f x).sqrt

@[continuity, fun_prop]
theorem Continuous.sqrt (h : Continuous f) : Continuous fun x => ‚àö(f x) :=

name: NNReal.sum_mul_le_sqrt_mul_sqrt
initialProofState:
Œπ : Type u_2
s : Finset Œπ
f g : Œπ ‚Üí NNReal
‚ä¢ LE.le (s.sum fun i => HMul.hMul (f i) (g i)) (HMul.hMul (NNReal.sqrt (s.sum fun i => HPow.hPow (f i) 2)) (NNReal.sqrt (s.sum fun i => HPow.hPow (g i) 2)))
decl:
/-- **Cauchy-Schwarz inequality** for finsets using square roots in `‚Ñù‚â•0`. -/
lemma sum_mul_le_sqrt_mul_sqrt (s : Finset Œπ) (f g : Œπ ‚Üí ‚Ñù‚â•0) :
    ‚àë i ‚àà s, f i * g i ‚â§ sqrt (‚àë i ‚àà s, f i ^ 2) * sqrt (‚àë i ‚àà s, g i ^ 2) :=
  (le_sqrt_iff_sq_le.2 <| sum_mul_sq_le_sq_mul_sq _ _ _).trans_eq <| sqrt_mul _ _

name: NNReal.sum_sqrt_mul_sqrt_le
initialProofState:
Œπ : Type u_2
s : Finset Œπ
f g : Œπ ‚Üí NNReal
‚ä¢ LE.le (s.sum fun i => HMul.hMul (NNReal.sqrt (f i)) (NNReal.sqrt (g i))) (HMul.hMul (NNReal.sqrt (s.sum fun i => f i)) (NNReal.sqrt (s.sum fun i => g i)))
decl:
/-- **Cauchy-Schwarz inequality** for finsets using square roots in `‚Ñù‚â•0`. -/
lemma sum_sqrt_mul_sqrt_le (s : Finset Œπ) (f g : Œπ ‚Üí ‚Ñù‚â•0) :
    ‚àë i ‚àà s, sqrt (f i) * sqrt (g i) ‚â§ sqrt (‚àë i ‚àà s, f i) * sqrt (‚àë i ‚àà s, g i) := by
  simpa [*] using sum_mul_le_sqrt_mul_sqrt _ (fun x ‚Ü¶ sqrt (f x)) (fun x ‚Ü¶ sqrt (g x))

name: Real.sum_mul_le_sqrt_mul_sqrt
initialProofState:
Œπ : Type u_2
s : Finset Œπ
f g : Œπ ‚Üí Real
‚ä¢ LE.le (s.sum fun i => HMul.hMul (f i) (g i)) (HMul.hMul (s.sum fun i => HPow.hPow (f i) 2).sqrt (s.sum fun i => HPow.hPow (g i) 2).sqrt)
decl:
/-- **Cauchy-Schwarz inequality** for finsets using square roots in `‚Ñù`. -/
lemma sum_mul_le_sqrt_mul_sqrt (s : Finset Œπ) (f g : Œπ ‚Üí ‚Ñù) :
    ‚àë i ‚àà s, f i * g i ‚â§ ‚àö(‚àë i ‚àà s, f i ^ 2) * ‚àö(‚àë i ‚àà s, g i ^ 2) :=
  (le_sqrt_of_sq_le <| sum_mul_sq_le_sq_mul_sq _ _ _).trans_eq <| sqrt_mul
    (sum_nonneg fun _ _ ‚Ü¶ by positivity) _

name: Real.sum_sqrt_mul_sqrt_le
initialProofState:
Œπ : Type u_2
f g : Œπ ‚Üí Real
s : Finset Œπ
hf : ‚àÄ (i : Œπ), LE.le 0 (f i)
hg : ‚àÄ (i : Œπ), LE.le 0 (g i)
‚ä¢ LE.le (s.sum fun i => HMul.hMul (f i).sqrt (g i).sqrt) (HMul.hMul (s.sum fun i => f i).sqrt (s.sum fun i => g i).sqrt)
decl:
/-- **Cauchy-Schwarz inequality** for finsets using square roots in `‚Ñù`. -/
lemma sum_sqrt_mul_sqrt_le (s : Finset Œπ) (hf : ‚àÄ i, 0 ‚â§ f i) (hg : ‚àÄ i, 0 ‚â§ g i) :
    ‚àë i ‚àà s, ‚àö(f i) * ‚àö(g i) ‚â§ ‚àö(‚àë i ‚àà s, f i) * ‚àö(‚àë i ‚àà s, g i) := by
  simpa [*] using sum_mul_le_sqrt_mul_sqrt _ (fun x ‚Ü¶ ‚àö(f x)) (fun x ‚Ü¶ ‚àö(g x))
